import React from "react"; import { Link, useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import axios from "axios"; export default function Login() { const histori = useHistory() const dispatch = useDispatch() const [nama, setNama] = React.useState(""); const [password, setPassword] = React.useState(""); const Login = () => { const options = { method: 'POST', url: 'https://afgan.hizraniaga.com/m_api.php', params: { a: 'login' }, headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, data: { username: nama, password: password } }; axios.request(options).then(function (response) { console.log(response.data); if (response.data.cek == 0) { return } else { dispatch({ type: "LOGIN", isLogin: true, payload: response.data.data, // level: response.data.data.user_level, // status: response.data.data.user_status, // token: token.token }) histori.push('/admin/penjualan') } }).catch(function (error) { console.error(error); }); } return ( <>
